pkgmetadata.longdescription: Access and Analyze eBird Status and Trends Data Products // Tools for accessing and analyzing eBird Status and Trends Data Products (https://science.ebird.org/en/status-and-trends). eBird (https://ebird.org/home) is a global database of bird observations collected by member of the public. eBird Status and Trends uses these data to model global bird distributions, abundances, and population trends at a high spatial and temporal resolution.
